title: Calories in Sausage Egg McMuffin
meta_description: Learn calories in mcmuffin sausage egg: one serving has 480 kcal, plus carbs, protein, fat, and more in this full nutrition guide.
assumptions: Standard McDonald's Sausage Egg McMuffin: English muffin, pork sausage patty, folded egg, American cheese; no customizations.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, and custom orders. Values based on standard U.S. McDonald's data; check app or menu for latest.

quick_answer.text: One Sausage Egg McMuffin provides 480 kcal, 21 g protein, and 30 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in one mcmuffin sausage egg?
faqs.a: About 480 kcal for a standard Sausage Egg McMuffin.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a sausage egg mcmuffin?
faqs.a: Approximately 21 g of protein per serving.

faqs.q: Does sausage egg mcmuffin have a lot of sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 830 mg sodium due to sausage and cheese.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in mcmuffin sausage egg?
faqs.a: Yes, about 30 g carbs mainly from the English muffin.

faqs.q: How does cooking method affect calories in mcmuffin sausage egg?
faqs.a: Standard grilled preparation; frying adds oil and caloriesâ€”custom orders vary.
